headline: Johnson & Johnson Announces Quarterly Dividend for First Quarter 2025
summary: NEW BRUNSWICK, N.J., January 02, 2025--Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a cash dividend for the first quarter of 2025 of $1.24 per share on the company’s common stock. The dividend is payable on March 4, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 18, 2025. The ex-dividend date is February 18, 2025.

headline: The Descent of an Army Vet Turned Corporate Consultant Named in the New Year’s Attack
summary: Texas born and bred, Shamsud-Din Jabbar worked at Deloitte before plowing a truck with an Islamic State flag into a New Orleans crowd.
